title: Print, "Corner Chimneypiece, published in "Nouvelles Chiminees Faitte en Plusier en Droits de la Hollande et  Autres Provinces du Dessin de D. Marot"", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and black ink on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in plate at lower right corner: chiminee a Langloise; along lower margin: avec Previllege des Etats Generaux des Province Vri s/ invent et Grav e par D. Marot
dimensions:
Overall: 34 x 22.5cm (13 3/8 x 8 7/8in.)
Platemark: 27.5 x 19 cm (10 13/16 x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Design for a mantlepiece in the corner of a room. The mantlepiece is ornate with a large cartouche and busts on either side. Along the walls are framed paintings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Corner Chimneypiece, published in "Nouvelles Chiminees Faitte en Plusier en Droits de la Hollande et  Autres Provinces du Dessin de D. Marot"", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and black ink on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-51.
